TopicTitle: Deep Space Kerbal Interstellar Series Trailer #2

Articles.Content:
It's Back!

Deep Space Kerbal! Join the crew of 'Icarus' on their maiden voyage to the stars! Icarus Launches in February.

I am using version 0.23.5 so remember that if you try to use the mods they will not work with 0.90.

Using the StarSystems Mod and Krag's Planet Factory, anyone is now able to create full, working multiple solar systems complete with planets and moons in KSP. Which is how I am creating Deep Space: Kerbal!
